headline: Food Lion Feeds Provides More than 28 Million Meals to Combat Child Hunger
summary: Summers Without Hunger campaign delivers more than 64 million meals in two years Summers Without Hunger Campaign Summers Without Hunger Campaign SALISBURY, N.C., Aug. 07, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- With school out and many children facing food insecurity, Food Lion customers and participating vendors helped provide more than 28 million meals* through the Summers Without Hunger initiative.
